column5: The fishing was tough, so i decided to get some (more) exercise and some time getting familiar with the new camera
Very nice!  G
Long shutter pics almost makes it look tropical! lol!   Good job.
Nice pics.  Where abouts?  Looking for something to do this week.
Yep. However , the walk down there and more-so back up takes away any confusion one may have of being on a tropical vacation lol. I was ready to puke after  the walk up lmao

Nice pics.  Where abouts?  Looking for something to do this week.  Im on the american side of the Lower Niagara River. Walk the trail down from  Whirlpool State Park. Once you get down to the water you can walk upstream to the whirlpool and whirlpool rapids, or down to devils hole. Its an easy path down and along the river, but gettin back up takes some lungs lol
Thanks Blaque.  I think I have my passport laying around somewhere.

Thanks Blaque.  I think I have my passport laying around somewhere.  Just wear a decent shoe/sneaker lol, i saw people walking down in flip flops as i was coming up. I gaurantee they didnt last long. The stairway down and the path have a few tricky spots, but still well cleared

Yep. However , the walk down there and more-so back up takes away any confusion one may have of being on a tropical vacation lol. I was ready to puke after  the walk up lmao  Should have gone in at Art Park
Should have gone in at Art Park  Lmao, sould have just rolled up in style and  gotten a tour helicopter to bring me in and out
Awesome pics.   Sights that us southern boys don't get to see very often.
Should have gone in at Art Park Better yet drive walk down the power plant entrance and hitch a ride back up. Done all the time there.
Love the photos. My favorite is the first. I have done that hike on the Lewiston side. A few knees ago. It was brutal and I was in top shape then. Good on you.

Love the photos. My favorite is the first. I have done that hike on the Lewiston side. A few knees ago. It was brutal and I was in top shape then. Good on you.  Ive been running all summer and consider myself to be in much better shape these days since i started doing that. However, stairs are a whole other animal lol, and uneven rock stairs, even worse. I was quickly reminded im not in as good a shape as i thought

I went down the devils hole trail the week before, and witnessed a guy that had to be in his 60's go up and down from what i counted.........3 times. As i was coming up to head home, he was going back down again and i asked him if he was crazy lol. He told me it was his 6th time going down that morning, and that "it was fun". He has a twisted idea of "fun"
Love the pictures, that first one is great. Thank you for sharing.  Jeff
great shots!
Amazing pics! Well done. Love that river.

Thanks!! Its an amazing place to have right in our backyards thats for sure.  When people rip on me for being from Buffalo........this is one of the many surrounding places i like to shove right down their throat
Let them think it is one giant Love Canal Blaque, more room for us. I was in Akron last month, down in your neck of the woods.
For your reunion right? Hope you had a blast
A blast was had. I asked everyone "do you know Blaque?", "Is he French?"
A blast was had. I asked everyone "do you know Blaque?", "Is he French?"  lmao........not an ounce of french in me (far as i know)
